review.title: “I was the contractor's right hand guy.”
review.pros: Pros – You will get valuable hands-on experience that is crucial to the understanding of construction to the built environment and your hands dirty.
review.cons: Cons – You will get criticized for not knowing the everything that your employer knows. You will get yelled at for working too slowly and for not using your brain, or using your brain too fast and not moving your feet quick enough.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – I don't have any feedback that I wish to publicly share on the internet. I am filling this out for the benefits of viewing basic salary information for an architectural intern.
